group_1.textRight: [surround:1209A01][bgEffect:shake][flashEffect:flashWhite1]Take... that!
[chara:6000:effect_7000_attack01][surround:1040A01]Hup!

group_1.textLeft: Let's go, Kirari! Mirror me!

group_1.textRight: Roger!

group_1.textLeft: Let's gooo!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:1209A06]Hiyaaaaaaah!!!

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][jingle:1022M05]March forth! Hikaru Army!
Phew... That was easy!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, thanks to all of us working together.

group_1.textRight: Great job being honest, Rena!

group_1.textLeft: Sh-shut up, you pest!
Oh, he's waking up.

group_1.textRight: Ugh... Where... am I...?

group_1.textLeft: You okay? We're at the beach.

group_1.textRight: Why...? I don't remember coming here...

group_1.textLeft: Hey, by any chance... do you use the Tomo-C app?

group_1.textRight: Um, yeah! I do, but why...?

group_1.textLeft: Did you use the matching function yesterday?
You're in the same chat group as me and the@others here.

group_1.textRight: Oh! Is your username "Nami?"

group_1.textLeft: Yep, that's me.
You didn't respond when I tried contacting you@during our meeting yesterday,
But you ended up coming here today anyway.@Why?

group_1.textRight: I really wanted to make some friends...
But Mom stopped me and said I couldn't@because it's dangerous...

group_1.textLeft: Well, considering you're in elementary school,@she's right.

group_1.textRight: Yeah... Momoko wanted to stop us for that same@reason.

group_1.textLeft: ...So what happened next?

group_1.textRight: She took my phone away... so I couldn't talk to@you guys anymore.
But I got it back today. I wanted to see you guys,
So I went to where you guys said you were@meeting up, and...
It turns out you guys were having a big fight...

group_1.textLeft: Th-that's because...

group_1.textRight: I figured I'd make things even worse if I tried@to join in,
So I tried matching up with a different group,
But I couldn't find anyone, and I got really mad@that I couldn't do anything, and...
And then... I...
...Huh. I can't remember what happened next.

group_1.textLeft: His memory is likely hazy.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, once that Witch gave him the Witch's Kiss,@everything afterwards must've become a blur.

group_1.textLeft: I'm sure he didn't intend to cause all that@vandalism or post it online.

group_1.textRight: But it doesn't change the fact that he did it...

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh*
Ah... well, you probably don't remember this,@but...
After you saw us... a lot of things happened and@we... we all kind of broke some things...

group_1.textRight: Huh...? I broke stuff, too?

group_1.textLeft: Well... yeah.
We were just about to do our apology tour,@so... you wanna come with us?
...We're all part of the same group, after all.

group_1.textRight: ...Yeah!
I'm glad they all forgave us!

group_1.textLeft: I honestly thought they'd be more pissed off@than that. It's actually kind of disappointing.
Alright, we're all gonna start filming tomorrow.
You'll be joining us, right?

group_1.textRight: What? Me?

group_1.textLeft: Of course. You're the sixth member.
That's right.

group_1.textRight: ...No. I don't want to join.

group_1.textLeft: Why not...?

group_1.textRight: I misunderstood you guys, and I did a bunch of@really bad things...
I don't deserve to be on your team...

group_1.textLeft: That's... we don't care about that...

group_1.textRight: And besides... you guys are really good friends,@and I don't wanna intrude on that.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:120901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]â€•!?

group_1.textRight: I bet you guys are gonna make the best movie@ever!
Good luck!

group_1.textLeft: Ah...

group_1.textRight: Now that the rest of us are all in this together,@we can go all out for tomorrow's shoot!

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah!

group_1.textRight: Why don't we start at dawn?

group_1.textLeft: Do you really get up that early, Ao?

group_1.textRight: Nope! Not unless you come wake me up.
Shall we call it a day and go home, then?

group_1.textLeft: ...No. I feel like that'd be a waste.
Tomorrow's going to be jam-packed with recording,@so... we should have all the fun we can, right?

group_1.textRight: Ah...! I see what you mean!

group_1.textCenter: Let's go play in the ocean together!
Well, if you really want to...

group_1.textLeft: We'll spend the rest of our day having fun!
